instructions:
# Character Sheet Required:
   •	Roll20 Mentor Subscription
   •	EotE-Dice.js

v1.1 – Updates:
   •	Skill tooltips quick reference for skill description and success, advantage, triumph, threat and despair rolls.
   •	Custom dice input for skills and weapons. Now you can add boost die to your skill. example '1b' = 1 boos.  All the dice roll codes from before work (#b #g #y #w #blk #p #r ).
•	Added Encumbrance Threshold and Current. It also adds 1 setback die per rank over characters threshold to you dice pool.
   •	Added checkbox click to view 'View Attachments' to weapons to hopefully save some space on the sheet.
   •	GM Dice Pool
The GM Dice Pool allows the GM to set the dice of the dice pool without the other players knowing what was entered. The results will still show for everyone in the chat but the players won't know before the roll what dice was added. 

v1.0 – Updates:
   •	Character sheet
   •	Basic dice rolls
   •	Tabs
